name: Monster Truck Power Fantasy
description:
Arcade game set to an original song, titled "I Have a Monster Truck" (free download, bro). Drive a monster truck through a city. Run over buildings. In your side view mirror, all you can see is a life of sin.

Windows only. The game is controlled with the mouse. Unzip the file, click the executable, tell your antivirus to chill out, man, and play.

Created in one week for the 2017 Secret Santa Jam at Glorious Trainwrecks, for Stranger, who requested a game with a monster truck that "rides higher than the birds themselves," whose "headlights will make the sun go dark." The monster truck in this game is not that tall, but is still very tall.
